greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 2^n - 2*(binomial(1,n) - binomial(0,n)).
comment: Essentially the same as A000079, A151821, A155559, A171449, and A171559.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
program: (PARI) vector(31, n, if(n<3, 2-n, 2^(n-1))) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Dec 01 2019
(MAGMA) [n lt 2 select 1-n else 2^n: n in [0..30]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Dec 01 2019
(Sage) [1,0]+[2^n for n in (2..30)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Dec 01 2019
(GAP) Concatenation([1,0], List([2..30], n-> 2^n )); # _G. C. Greubel_, Dec 01 2019
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Mar 01 2011
